Description: On I-95 at mile marker 90.8 in the County of Hanover, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The south left shoulder and left lane are closed.

Description: On Rt. 628 in the County of Warren, in the vicinity of Indian Hollow Rd; Panhandle Rd; Rt. 613N/S (Warren County), motorists can expect potential delays due to standing water. All north lanes are closed. All south lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Standing Water - Closed
